title: If you could say one thing to Riot and have them actually listen?
body: What would you say to Riot to make the game play better?

replies.body: Need some minor changes to matchmaking: If you have lost several games in a row get teamed with a team that has won several in a row. (Yes, I'm salty, in my last 4 ranked games my teammates stated that they were tilted af)
make it so i cant use my abilities by clicking on the map. I've ulted the wrong way with ez followed by mia pings from my team one too many times

Focus more on strategic rather than mechanical skill.

Outcomes should be decided by comparing two players' comparative skills at the game, not who can mash their buttons faster.
Do a better job of explaining the subclass differences.

4 new skills for all champions...  ahah  wouldn't that be nice?

My old Fiora back...  I want the pre-rework Fiora back. That was my main.
Put Dominion back in the queue.
